welcome_message_body: Welcome to Uiwang, South Korea! Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Suwon Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Seoul AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal with modern facilities, dedicated for international flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Gimpo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'GMP Free WiFi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Osan AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Osan AB Airport, primarily used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The terminal for domestic flights and some international flights.
